page.title: 05A DAY AT BODIAM MANOR SCHOOL
page.content: I am 13 years old and in my final year at an Independent school preparing for Common Entrance Examinations. The day begins with assembly at 8.50am. for the whole school. The first hour is given to a weekly examination practice after which we hurry outside for morning break. Next is a computing lesson during which we learn to program in Basic. Then Science and English Literature lessons bring us to lunchtime. After lunch and a break we have Gymnastics in the new School Hall. Then in Pottery we use a wheel to model clay. Our last lesson is Mathematics. School finishes at 4.00pm. when we may optionally stay to do our prep. until the Dancing at 5.15pm. My mother collects me in the car at 6.15pm.
